files.name: avatar-fallback.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { Avatar as AvatarPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
	let { class: className, ref = $bindable(null), ...restProps } = $props();
</script>

<AvatarPrimitive.Fallback
	bind:ref
	class={cn("flex h-full w-full items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-muted", className)}
	{...restProps}
/>

files.name: avatar-image.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { Avatar as AvatarPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
	let { class: className, src, alt, ref = $bindable(null), ...restProps } = $props();
</script>

<AvatarPrimitive.Image
	bind:ref
	{src}
	{alt}
	class={cn("aspect-square h-full w-full", className)}
	{...restProps}
/>

files.name: avatar.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { Avatar as AvatarPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
	let {
		class: className,
		ref = $bindable(null),
		loadingStatus = $bindable("loading"),
		...restProps
	} = $props();
</script>

<AvatarPrimitive.Root
	bind:loadingStatus
	bind:ref
	class={cn("relative flex size-10 shrink-0 overflow-hidden rounded-full", className)}
	{...restProps}
/>

files.name: index.js
